verses.verse: Maschil <S%H4905><s%> <S%H8688><s%> of Asaph <S%H623><s%>. O 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, why hast thou cast us off <S%H2186><s%> <S%H8804><s%> for ever <S%H5331><s%>? why doth thine anger <S%H639><s%> smoke <S%H6225><s%> <S%H8799><s%> against the sheep <S%H6629><s%> of thy pasture <S%H4830><s%> ?

Remember <S%H2142><s%> <S%H8798><s%> thy congregation <S%H5712><s%>, which thou hast purchased <S%H7069><s%> <S%H8804><s%> of old <S%H6924><s%>; the rod <S%H7626><s%> of thine inheritance <S%H5159><s%>, which thou hast redeemed <S%H1350><s%> <S%H8804><s%>; this mount <S%H2022><s%> TZiyon <S%H6726><s%>, wherein thou hast dwelt <S%H7931><s%> <S%H8804><s%>.

Lift up <S%H7311><s%> <S%H8685><s%> thy feet <S%H6471><s%> unto the perpetual <S%H5331><s%> desolations <S%H4876><s%>; even all that the enemy <S%H341><s%> <S%H8802><s%> hath done wickedly <S%H7489><s%> <S%H8689><s%> in the sanctuary <S%H6944><s%>.

Thine enemies <S%H6887><s%> <S%H8802><s%> roar <S%H7580><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of thy congregations <S%H4150><s%>; they set up <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8804><s%> their ensigns <S%H226><s%> for signs <S%H226><s%>.
A man was famous <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8735><s%> according as he had lifted up <S%H935><s%> <S%H8688><s%> <S%H4605><s%> axes <S%H7134><s%> upon the thick <S%H5442><s%> trees <S%H6086><s%>.
But now they break down <S%H1986><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the carved work <S%H6603><s%> thereof at once <S%H3162><s%> with axes <S%H3781><s%> and hammers <S%H3597><s%>.

They have cast <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8765><s%> fire <S%H784><s%> into thy sanctuary <S%H4720><s%>, they have defiled <S%H2490><s%> <S%H8765><s%> by casting down the dwelling place <S%H4908><s%> of thy name <S%H8034><s%> to the ground <S%H776><s%>.

They said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in their hearts <S%H3820><s%>, Let us destroy <S%H3238><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them together <S%H3162><s%>: they have burned up <S%H8313><s%> <S%H8804><s%> all the synagogues <S%H4150><s%> of 'Elohim <S%H410><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%>.

We see <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8804><s%> not our signs <S%H226><s%>: there is no more any prophet <S%H5030><s%>: neither is there among us any that knoweth <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8802><s%> how long <S%H5704><s%>.

O 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, how long shall the adversary <S%H6862><s%> reproach <S%H2778><s%> <S%H8762><s%>? shall the enemy <S%H341><s%> <S%H8802><s%> blaspheme <S%H5006><s%> <S%H8762><s%> thy name <S%H8034><s%> for ever <S%H5331><s%> ?

Why withdrawest <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8686><s%> thou thy hand <S%H3027><s%>, even thy right hand <S%H3225><s%>? pluck <S%H3615><s%> <S%H8761><s%> it out of <S%H7130><s%> thy bosom <S%H2436><s%> <S%H8675><s%> <S%H2436><s%>.
For 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> is my King <S%H4428><s%> of old <S%H6924><s%>, working <S%H6466><s%> <S%H8802><s%> salvation <S%H3444><s%> in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>.

Thou didst divide <S%H6565><s%> <S%H8782><s%> the sea <S%H3220><s%> by thy strength <S%H5797><s%>: thou brakest <S%H7665><s%> <S%H8765><s%> the heads <S%H7218><s%> of the dragons <S%H8577><s%> in the waters <S%H4325><s%>.

Thou brakest <S%H7533><s%> <S%H8765><s%> the heads <S%H7218><s%> of leviathan <S%H3882><s%> in pieces, and gavest <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> him to be meat <S%H3978><s%> to the people <S%H5971><s%> inhabiting the wilderness <S%H6728><s%>.
Thou didst cleave <S%H1234><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the fountain <S%H4599><s%> and the flood <S%H5158><s%>: thou driedst up <S%H3001><s%> <S%H8689><s%> mighty <S%H386><s%> rivers <S%H5104><s%>.
The day <S%H3117><s%> is thine, the night <S%H3915><s%> also is thine: thou hast prepared <S%H3559><s%> <S%H8689><s%> the light <S%H3974><s%> and the sun <S%H8121><s%>.
Thou hast set <S%H5324><s%> <S%H8689><s%> all the borders <S%H1367><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>: thou hast made <S%H3335><s%> <S%H8804><s%> summer <S%H7019><s%> and winter <S%H2779><s%>.

Remember <S%H2142><s%> <S%H8798><s%> this, that the enemy <S%H341><s%> <S%H8802><s%> hath reproached <S%H2778><s%> <S%H8765><s%>, O YY <S%H3068><s%>, and that the foolish <S%H5036><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> have blasphemed <S%H5006><s%> <S%H8765><s%> thy name <S%H8034><s%>.

O deliver <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> not the soul <S%H5315><s%> of thy turtledove <S%H8449><s%> unto the multitude <S%H2416><s%> of the wicked: forget <S%H7911><s%> <S%H8799><s%> not the congregation <S%H2416><s%> of thy poor <S%H6041><s%> for ever <S%H5331><s%>.

Have respect <S%H5027><s%> <S%H8685><s%> unto the covenant <S%H1285><s%>: for the dark <S%H4285><s%> places of the earth <S%H776><s%> are full <S%H4390><s%> <S%H8804><s%> of the habitations <S%H4999><s%> of cruelty <S%H2555><s%>.

O let not the oppressed <S%H1790><s%> return <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8799><s%> ashamed <S%H3637><s%> <S%H8737><s%>: let the poor <S%H6041><s%> and needy <S%H34><s%> praise <S%H1984><s%> <S%H8762><s%> thy name <S%H8034><s%>.

Arise <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, O 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, plead <S%H7378><s%> <S%H8798><s%> thine own cause <S%H7379><s%>: remember <S%H2142><s%> <S%H8798><s%> how the foolish man <S%H5036><s%> reproacheth <S%H2781><s%> thee daily <S%H3117><s%>.

Forget <S%H7911><s%> <S%H8799><s%> not the voice <S%H6963><s%> of thine enemies <S%H6887><s%> <S%H8802><s%>: the tumult <S%H7588><s%> of those that rise up <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8801><s%> against thee increaseht <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8802><s%> continually <S%H8548><s%>.
